short_description: A diverse set of CHO molecules
long_description: This dataset contains an expanded set of the AlkEthOH and PhEthOH datasets, which were used in the original derivation of the smirnoff99Frosst parameters.

change_log.author: trevorgokey
change_log.description: A diverse set of CHO molecules. The molecules in this set were generated to include all stereoisomers if chirality was ambiguous from the SMILES input. Conformations were generated which had an RMSD of at least 4 Angstroms from all other conformers
